member.name: XAUDIO2_EFFECT_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: Contains information about an XAPO for use in an effect chain.

member.name: XAUDIO2_EFFECT_DESCRIPTOR.pEffect
member.summary: Pointer to the IUnknown interface of the XAPO object.

member.name: XAUDIO2_EFFECT_DESCRIPTOR.InitialState
member.summary: TRUE if the effect should begin in the enabled state. Otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: XAUDIO2_EFFECT_DESCRIPTOR.OutputChannels
member.summary: Number of output channels the effect should produce.
